summary: This mod almost completely changes the way the bows in Skyrim work. This WILL CHANGE the way you play. When you download this, you will either become a Skyrim sniper or a quick draw master. The way it was meant to be.
descriptionHtml:
[center][/center][center][/center][center][img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/images/110/7756592-1410221253.png[/img]
[font=Georgia]
...Real Archery is ready to change the way you play...

[color=#ff0000][size=6][i]---NEW BOWS AND ITEMS---[/i][/size][/color]

[color=#ff0000][size=6][i]---NEW UPDATE READ AFTER BOWS AND ARROWS---[/i][/size][/color]

This does not change anything dramatically. I have tested this mod in my own game and have made it perfectly balanced and fun.

SNIPER OR QUICK DRAW
you choose

[/font][font=Georgia]I have changed bows for a more realistic way of playing. The way Bethesda set up the bows, was so damn basic...
This mod changes the pull speed and equalizes it with damage to make the bows function like real bows. 
[quote]"Must have been the gynecologist" ~Random Guy At The Restaurant~[/quote][b][color=#ff0000]BOWS[/color][/b]
[u][i]...For example...[/i][/u]

[b]-Long Bow[/b]: The long bow was meant for maximum power, but in the game you can pull it back like its got two pounds on it. 
[/font]This mod would make this one more realistic by increasing the draw time to simulate a harder pull, but adds damage to the bow, to simulate the thrust actually adding much more stopping power 
[font=Georgia]
[/font]
[font=Georgia][b]-Hunting Bow:[/b] The hunting bow in Skyrim actually has a short bow frame. Thus making it easier to pull back faster, but have less damage. This makes a more realistic game-play by adjusting pull time and damage. Compared to the long bow it is faster but has less damage.


[color=#ff0000]ARROWS[/color]
[i][u]...For example...
[/u][/i][/font]
[font=Georgia]The arrows in this game have been setup for only damage increase dependent on the material of the arrow, really?

[/font][b]-Iron arrow:[/b] The iron arrow realistically should be heavier and should have more stopping power. What i did to make the iron arrow more realistic is change the effects of gravity and speed of the arrow while in flight.

[b]-Ebony arrow:[/b] Since the ebony arrow is a very streamline and bodkin style arrow, I made it more realistic by making it faster and lighter while in flight. It may have a little less power than a broad-head but you can get it to your target faster. 
[quote]"Unzip Zip Unzip Zip Unzip, This is fun" ~Me with my girl~[/quote][color=#ff0000][size=4]NEW UPDATE[/size][/color]
[b]-Classy Bows:[/b] I have added two new types of bows for every regular bow! Each bow now has a Light and Heavy variant! All fully craft-able! 

-Heavy bows are stronger but have longer pull.
-Heavy bows +5 damage, -pull speed
-Light bows -5 damage +pull speed
-All bows require bow strings

[size=4][color=#ff0000]NEW ITEMS[/color]
[/size]-Bow String
-Bow String (Heavy)
-Bow String (Light)
-Heavy and Light variants of almost all bows
[quote]"The Gods know how much milk you put in your cereal" ~Nazeem~  [/quote]
[b]Installation:[/b] Just unzip and move the esp into your data folder
[b]Uninstall: [/b]Just do the opposite... If you don't get that, go to bed kid[b]...[/b]

[b]Questions:[/b] Ask away and always be sure to add your ideas, but don't be a Nasty Nazeem Skeever Hybrid [/center][font=Georgia]


[/font]
